com.foreach.across.modules.entity.web

Interface EntityViewModel


  • public interface EntityViewModel
    Contains common Model or ViewElementBuilderContext attribute names.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ENTITY
      When set, expected to hold the current entity that is being modified.
      static String VIEW_COMMAND
      Expected to hold the current EntityViewCommand.
      static String VIEW_CONTEXT
      Expected to hold the current EntityViewContext.
      static String VIEW_REQUEST
      Expected to hold the current EntityViewRequest.

    • Field Detail

      • ENTITY

        static final String ENTITY
        When set, expected to hold the current entity that is being modified. This can be a modified entity instance (DTO). If you want the original entity that is being edited, you should get it via the EntityViewContext.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VIEW_REQUEST

        static final String VIEW_REQUEST
        Expected to hold the current EntityViewRequest. Provides access to the current EntityViewContext and EntityViewCommand. These might also be directly available as VIEW_CONTEXT and VIEW_COMMAND respectively.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VIEW_COMMAND

        static final String VIEW_COMMAND
        Expected to hold the current EntityViewCommand.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VIEW_CONTEXT

        static final String VIEW_CONTEXT
        Expected to hold the current EntityViewContext.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
